thread.title: Suicide car bomb kills 4, injures 40 in Afghanistan
thread.title_full: Suicide car bomb kills 4, injures 40 in Afghanistan | News24

author: news24.com
title: Suicide car bomb kills 4, injures 40 in Afghanistan
text:
Kabul (dpa) - A suicide car bomb struck the office of a district governor on the outskirts of Kabul Wednesday, killing at least four people, an official said.
The bomber detonated his explosives at the gate of the governor's office in Paghman district, west of Kabul, said Ebadullah Karimi, Kabul police spokesperson.
The head of the Criminal Investigation Department for the district was among the dead.
"Around 40 people were injured," Karimi said.
